frontmatter.title: ♿ Accessibility is your job !!
frontmatter.description: Web accessibility is not just an afterthought of web development. This is something you've to do as you create content, pages and applications on the web. To not think of accessibility is like discriminating people. Accessibility is making your application reach out to 100% of your user base, irrespective of their disabilities while browsing the web.
